hadiths.text: Thabit Al-Bunani said:"I was with Anas bin Malik and a daughter of his was with him. He said: 'A woman came to the Messenger of Allah and offered herself in marriage to him. She said: O Messenger of Allah, do you want to marry me?

chapter.ara-name: باب عَرْضِ الْمَرْأَةِ نَفْسَهَا عَلَى مَنْ تَرْضَى .
chapter.eng-name: A Woman Offering Herself In Marriage To One Whom She Likes
